name: World Poker Tour [PSP]
description:
Fans of Texas Hold’em Poker will love playing online poker games without the stress of the casino!

Don’t settle for the all-in poker fests in OTHER social poker games! Play the best online poker games and aim for the royal flush with PlayWPT Poker, the best Vegas-style poker app that brings authentic Texas Hold’em poker to your hands.

PlayWPT Poker offers more than just quick poker games, but an authentic poker experience. Put your Hold’em skills to the test against your friends with WPT Poker’s elite around-the-clock casino games, tournaments, and sit-n-go’s, all straight from the Vegas strip you know and love.

Play live tournaments or become a poker pro with PlayWPT Poker!

PlayWPT Poker Features:

• Play Card Games Anywhere – Your PlayWPT Poker casino balance is connected to all your devices. Play on your phone and continue playing on your tablet or Facebook account!

• Live Poker – Play online with other poker players!

• Lucky Spin – Claim FREE GOLD every two hours when you give the game wheel a spin!

• WPT Rewards – Play at the WPT high-stakes tables and get special rewards. Earn Reward Points when you play and exchange your Reward Points for Gold!

• HD Avatars – Collect avatars and compete in Hold’em tournaments as your favorite avatar!

• Animated Emojis – Celebrate your latest win or bemoan a bad hand with an animated emoji. Let your opponents know EXACTLY how you feel on the card table!

Enjoy your favorite casino games without having to leave your house! Play poker games and online tournaments against friends and opponents worldwide with PlayWPT Poker.

Download today and play your favorite casino card game!


Note:

• The games are intended for an adult audience.
• The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
• Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."
